message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to show you our top-of-the-line product. I think you'll love it! I'm willing to offer it to you for $15000. This is a great deal, and I'm confident you won't find a better price anywhere else.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm!  While I'm interested in your product, $15000 is a bit above my budget.  I'm willing to pay $10000 for it.  Let me know what you think.

Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand that $10000 is a bit lower than what I was hoping for, but I'm willing to compromise. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $12500. This is a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise. $12500 is still a little higher than what I'm comfortable with. Let's meet in the middle at $11000. I'm confident this is a fair price for both of us.

Bob, I understand your desire to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go down to $11000. However, I'm willing to make another concession. I'll sell the product to you for $12250. This is a great deal, and I think you'll really appreciate the value you'll get from the product.

Alice, I appreciate your continued willingness to negotiate. I'm still close to my budget limit, so I can only go up to $11500. If you're willing to meet me there, I'm confident we can finalize this deal.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints, and I'm willing to make another concession. However, I'm not willing to go all the way down to $11500. I'll meet you halfway between $12250 and $11500. I'll sell the product to you for $11875. This is a great compromise, and I think you'll be happy with the deal.
